Name: Color Crush
About the game: Color Crush is a match 3 game where you swap and match the shapes. Solve the levels making smart moves. Your next move can be deciding whether you win or lose. Every day you gain a free daily bonus spins. You can win boosts to activate in the levels or boost to activate before you enter the level. But you can also get gems to buy specifically what you want.
Meta Title: Color Crush: Apr 22, 2020, Frederik Holst and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Color Crush? Check out the release date (Apr 22, 2020), developer insights from Frederik Holst, and a complete game summary.
